title: Nice kicks off 134th carnival with Trump and Kim on parade
text:
Nice kicks off 134th carnival with Trump and Kim on parade   01:03 
Carnival joy filled the French Riviera town of Nice on Saturday night (February 17) as it welcomed the 134th edition of the King's Carnival with space as its main theme, honouring French astronaut Thomas Pesquet. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
